title: After thousands of years...
body:
I have finally unboxed the Legendary panty ruining skin
http://imgur.com/a/RnDku

replies.body: It is the last skin to my completed Vayne collection...... wait i still need Vindicator

> [{quoted}](name=dirtyjob13,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=Epi22rZg,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-08-01T20:17:49.639+0000)
>
> It is the last skin to my completed Vayne collection...... wait i still need Vindicator

Oh Vayne main?

*walks away,vigorously shaking head, remembering horrors when playing support*
On behalf of all the Adc players in general. We are sorry for the flame when we are having off days
It's fine... Not all of you are devil spawns

coming from a shaco I don't know if it's valid.

I know you're cool, but, I play jungle, and you're shaco.
My 2nd best champion is Taric and support is my 2nd best role, probably tied with Jungle tbh

Soulstealer Vayne.
The OTHER Gemstone skin.
Got it out of a box... The feeling was even more euphoric... The 1/100000000000000 chance
